job description: Performs data analysis, including business modeling and statistical analysis, validating with external data (quantitative and qualitative). Evaluates the methods and procedures used to obtain data in order to ensure validity, applicability, efficiency, and accuracy. Performs Data Profiling of Data Quality (DQ) for targeted source data, and reporting of results. Assists with data discovery and performs data quality profiling. Uses advanced SQL skills to develop SQL queries to better understand analyze performance and transactional data.
